Watching TV spots I came across the publicity of the new PS2 game entitled 
"Fu-un Bakumatsu Den".

http://www.genki.co.jp/games/bmd/

As we can guess by the title there are not only Shinsengumi (as usual that 
inseparable trio who are Kondo, Hijikata , Okita) plus Serizawa for some reason, 
and Sasaki sama, there are Ishin people like Sakamoto, Saigo and even Izo 
Okada...

I'm not sure if someone has already posted about this, if it's done sorry for 
double post.

Tama
